content: this slouchy beanie is perfect for first-time knitters basic techniques make it a quick knit for all skill levels and the modern style makes it the perfect gift yarn one skein i love this yarn 100% acrylic 355 yards/325 meters per 198 grams needles us 9 / 5 5 mm 16 circular needle notions darning needle for weaving in ends gauge 16 sts x 20 row = 4 in stockinette sizes baby toddler child adult = 14 16 18 20 inches wide un-stretched
